item.description:
This is an annual fund raiser for The St. Brigid Church Ladies Guild.

Prizes will be awarded to the winners, door prizes will be drawn, and a teacup auction will be held.Â  Refreshments, coffee, tea, and homemade desserts will be served.

Tickets are available at the door, and will cost $5 (or $4 for seniors).

If you'd rather play something other than Whist additional tables will be set up for that purpose.
item.how_to_find_us: Enter through the side doors (on Cambridge Street). The event is downstairs. I recommend that we connect by cell phone.

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Monte Carlo Whist Party in West Hartford
